## Container.getResolver() method

Gets a resolver for the specified key.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getResolver<K extends Key, T = K>(key: K | Key, autoRegister?: boolean): Resolver<T> | null;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

key


</td><td>

K \| [Key](../fast-element.key/)


</td><td>

The key to get the resolver for.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

autoRegister


</td><td>

boolean


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Indicates whether or not to try to auto-register a dependency for the key if one is not explicitly registered.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

[Resolver](../fast-element.resolver/)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt; \| null
